text: â€œWayel yathanggi ojasing adudagi cheksillu. Makhoina achonba phi settuna koina chatpa amadi keithelnachingba maphamsingda misingna makhoibu ikai khumnabaga loinana koubirakpa adu pammi, Aduga Jihudisinggi tinnapham sanglen synagogue-singda akhannaba phamphamda phamba amadi chak khangphamda ikai khumnaba misinggi phamphamda phamba makhoina pammi.
